articles.description: Wen Dan and Bingfeng Gu scored for China after Vanadana Katariya gave India the lead. The Indian women’s hockey team will play the Netherlands next on Sunday.
articles.content: The Indian hockey teams campaign at the Womens FIH Pro League 2023-24 got off to a disappointing start after losing 2-1 to the Peoples Republic of China at the Kalinga Stadium in Bhubaneswar on Satur… [+1968 chars]
